title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8106.17 - Village of Westfield
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8106.17 - Village of Westfield

State Regulations
(a) Bourne

Street. The northeastbound and southwestbound roadways of Bourne Street between

Route 394, North Portage Road and a point 1,400+- feet northeast of Route 394, in the Village of Westfield; provided however, that this route is designated as
an access highway for use by tractor-semi-trailer combinations with no overall
length limitations and for vehicles 102 inches wide, and is not hereby
designated as an access highway for tandem trailer vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8106.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
